title: Boris Johnson announces tougher entry rules after 2 cases of omicron detected in the U.K.
content:
1. Boris Johnson announces tougher entry rules after 2 cases of omicron detected in the U.K.  The Washington Post
  2. British Prime Minister Johnson Announces Covid Omicron Variant Detected in U.K.  NBC News
  3. COVID variant spreads to more countries as world on alert  Associated Press
  4. COVID booster advice should come imminently, says UK minister  Reuters UK
  5. Covid: Travel and mask rules tightened over Omicron variant  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Boris Johnson announces tougher entry rules after 2 cases of omicron detected in the U.K.  The Washington Post
British Prime Minister Johnson Announces Covid Omicron Variant Detected in U.K.  NBC News
COVID variant spreads to more countries as world on alert  Associated Press
COVID booster advice should come imminently, says UK minister  Reuters UK
Covid: Travel and mask rules tightened over Omicron variant  BBC News

localize.title: 英国で2件のオミクロンが検出された後、ボリス・ジョンソンが入国規則の強化を発表。
在英国检测出两例奥美拉唑后，鲍里斯-约翰逊宣布制定更严厉的入境规定。
在英國檢測出兩例奧美拉唑後，鮑里斯-約翰遜宣佈制定更嚴厲的入境規定。
